intro: Ruizterania obtusata, commonly known as the broad-leaved ruizterania, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant features palmate leaves with lobed margins and produces showy, pinkish-white flowers that bloom in clusters. Ruizterania obtusata is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and along riverbanks. Its botanical characteristics make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
